content.raw: I looked into this a bit. Gazebo is smart about where to look for resource files and tries to look in difference places. That's easy to do on a local files system. It's difficult to do in gzweb as we'll need to do multiple ajax queries / http requests to find out if file exists on server or not. This can result in a slow loading process. We'll need to think about the best way to go about locating files. Ticketed issue #114 for now.
